skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Master front-end development with Coursera's Meta Front-End Developer course. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, frameworks, and cutting-edge technologies. Build real-world projects, optimize performance, and advance your career

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Essential back-end development concepts, frameworks, database management, API development, security, scalability, deployment, and includes hands-on projects for practical experience in building web applications

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Proficient in UI/UX design, adept at creating intuitive and visually appealing interfaces for web and mobile applications. Skilled in user research, wireframing, prototyping, and conducting usability testing to ensure optimal user experiences. Strong understanding of design principles, accessibility standards, and industry trends

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Proficient in Webflow Development, skilled in creating responsive and visually stunning websites using the Webflow platform. Experience in customizing templates, integrating third-party services, and optimizing sites for performance and SEO

portfolio.title: Little Lemon Project
portfolio.description: A small-scale web project, incorporating HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build interactive and visually appealing user interfaces. Through this project, I gained practical experience in designing and implementing front-end solutions, enhancing their skills in web development

timelineElements.title: Aircraft Catapult Maintenance Technician - US Navy
timelineElements.description: Contributed to a team of 275 maintenance technicians and performed inspections, maintenance, and upkeep on 2 steam-powered aircraft catapults and associated equipment.

timelineElements.title: Maintenance Shift Supervisor
timelineElements.description: Managed team of 16 technicians, maintaining 4 aircraft landing systems. Oversaw tool inventory, training records, and correspondence. Demonstrated expertise in aviation operations, maintenance management, and leadership.

timelineElements.title: Assistant Division Manager
timelineElements.description: Led maintenance team overseeing aircraft landing units, managed $65M equipment, ensured 100% readiness, provided security for $720M assets, and supported morale and fundraising initiatives. Skilled in personnel and duty management.

timelineElements.title: Software Development Intern
timelineElements.description: As an intern at Allegiant Vets, I engage in a comprehensive six-month program focused on full-stack cloud development and core computer science, utilizing SQL, Python, and automation for enhanced insights and efficiency.

timelineElements.title: American Military University
timelineElements.description: Holder of a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology from American Military University, skilled in leveraging technology to drive innovation and efficiency. Experienced in diverse IT domains, including networking, security, and software development.
